member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditor.BusyIndicatorTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a to be used when displaying a busy indicator during long running operations, e.g. when loading an image. When no template is specified, a default busy indicator is shown.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditor.SaveAsync(System.IO.Stream,Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ImageFormat,System.Double)
member.summary: Saves the currently edited image to the specified stream, encoding it with the given format and quality. The saved image contains all currently applied changes in the editor.
member.param: Specifies the output stream to save the image to.
Specifies the image format to encode the image to.
member.returns: Returns a to await the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditor.SaveAsync(System.IO.Stream,Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ImageFormat,System.Double,Xamarin.Forms.Size)
member.summary: Saves the currently edited image to the specified stream, encoding it with the given format, quality and size. The saved image contains all currently applied changes in the editor.
member.param: Specifies the output stream to save the image to.
Specifies the image format to encode the image to.
member.returns: Returns a to await the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditor.SaveAsync(System.IO.Stream,Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ImageFormat,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Saves the currently edited image to the specified stream, encoding it with the given format, quality and scale. The saved image contains all currently applied changes in the editor.
member.param: Specifies the output stream to save the image to.
Specifies the image format to encode the image to.
member.returns: Returns a to await the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CompositeToolbarItem
member.summary: Base abstract class for all toolbar items, which can contain nested toolbar items. When the toolbar item is selected, the nested toolbar items are expanded on the toolbar. The property controls whether the nested toolbar items are expanded on a separate line or on the same line of the toolbar.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CompositeToolbarItem.Items
member.summary: Gets a collection with the child items of this toolbar item. When is set to true, the toolbar items specified with this property are appended after the auto-generated ones.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio
member.summary: Represents the aspect ratio expressed as the ratio between the width and height of an image.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Free
member.summary: Special value, indicating the aspect ratio should not be constrained.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Original
member.summary: Special value, indicating the aspect ratio should match the original image.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Square
member.summary: Special value, indicating the width and height of the image should be equal.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of an aspect ratio with the specified components.
member.param: Specifies the width component of the aspect ratio.
Specifies the height component of the aspect ratio.

member.summary: Converts the specified aspect ratio to its floating-point representation.
member.param: Specifies the aspect ratio to convert.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.op_Equality(Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio,Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio)
member.summary: Compares the specified two aspect ratios for equality.
member.param: Specifies the left operand for the comparison.
Specifies the right operand for the comparison.
member.returns: True, if the two aspect ratios are equal, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.op_Inequality(Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio,Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio)
member.summary: Compares the specified two aspect ratios for inequality.
member.param: Specifies the left operand for the comparison.
Specifies the right operand for the comparison.
member.returns: True, if the two aspect ratios are not equal, false otherwise.

member.summary: Parses the specified string and converts it to an aspect ratio.
member.param: Specifies the input string to parse.
Returns the converted aspect ratio on success.
member.returns: True, if the parse operation is successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the specified string and converts it to an aspect ratio.
member.param: Specifies the input string to parse.
member.returns: The converted aspect ratio on success.
member.exception: If the specified string cannot be parsed.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Equals(Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio)
member.summary: Compares the current aspect ratio with the specified one for equality.
member.param: Specifies the aspect ratio for comparison.
member.returns: True, if the two aspect ratios are equal, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.AspectRatio.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current aspect ratio with the specified object for equality.
member.param: Specifies the object value for comparison.
member.returns: True, if the two objects are equal, false otherwise.

member.summary: Computes the hash code of the current aspect ratio.

member.summary: Converts the current aspect ratio to its floating-point representation.

member.summary: Converts the specified string to an aspect ratio.

member.summary: Allows displaying an arbitrary content in the toolbar via a . The property of the created template content is set to the currently active tool in the image editor. This allows direct data binding of the components from the template to the properties of the tool.

member.summary: Gets or sets the to be used with this toolbar item. The property of the created template content is set to the currently active tool in the image editor. This allows direct data binding of the components from the template to the properties of the tool.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar
member.summary: Provides a customizable toolbar for the component. The toolbar exposes all actions supported by the image editor via highly customizable toolbar items. The toolbar items can be styled, arranged and grouped together in different configurations to better suit the needs of the application.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.AutoGenerateItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to auto-generate all items of the toolbar by default.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.IsMultiLine
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the display nested levels of toolbar items on multiple lines. When set to true, nested levels of toolbar items are displayed on separate lines in the toolbar. When set to false, nested levels of toolbar items are displayed on a single line in the toolbar, whith the option to navigate back and forward between the different levels.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.ImageEditor
member.summary: Gets or sets the control this toolbar is attached to.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.OverflowButtonText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the overflow button. The overflow button is displayed when not all toolbar items can fit the available space.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.OverflowButtonTextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of the overflow button. The overflow button is displayed when not all toolbar items can fit the available space.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.OverflowButtonFontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family of the overflow button. The overflow button is displayed when not all toolbar items can fit the available space.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.OverflowButtonTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a for the overflow button. The overflow button is displayed when not all toolbar items can fit the available space.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.ItemSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the extra spacing between the items of the toolbar.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.RadImageEditorToolbar.Items
member.summary: Gets a collection of items to display in the toolbar. When is set to true, the toolbar items specified with this property are appended after the auto-generated ones.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.SaturationTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive saturation adjustment in the image editor.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.SaturationTool.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.SaturationTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current adjustment factor of the saturation filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 1 preserves the original saturation of the image. Values below 0 decrease the saturation, where 0 produces a grayscale image. Values above 0 increase the saturation, producing an oversaturated image.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.HueTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive hue adjustment in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.HueTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current adjustment factor of the hue filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 0 preserves the original hue of the image. Values below 0 shift the hue in negative direction, where -1 produces the maximum negative hue shift. Values above 0 shift the hue in positive direction, where 1 produces the maximum positive hue shift.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ContrastTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive contrast adjustment in the image editor.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ContrastTool.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ContrastTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current adjustment factor of the contrast filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 1 preserves the original contrast of the image. Values below 0 decrease the contrast, where 0 produces a gray image. Values above 0 increase the contrast, producing a high-contrast image.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.BrightnessTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive brightness adjustment in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.BrightnessTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current adjustment factor of the brightness filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 0 preserves the original brightness of the image. Values below 0 decrease the brightness, where -1 produces a black image. Values above 0 increase the brightness, where 1 produces a white image.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.SharpenTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive sharpen filter in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.SharpenTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current strength of the sharpen filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 0 preserves the original sharpness of the image. Values above 0 increase the sharpen filter strength.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.BlurTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive blur filter in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.BlurTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current strength of the blur filter. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 0 preserves the original sharpness of the image. Values above 0 increase the blur filter strength.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CropTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive crop operation in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CropTool.Geometry
member.summary: Gets or sets the geometry of the crop selection.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CropTool.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the aspect ratio of the crop selection.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.CropTool.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the current crop bounding rectangle.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ImageEditorTool
member.summary: Base abstract class for all tools handling interactive operations in the image editor.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ImageEditorTool.HasChanges
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current tool has any pending changes to apply.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ResizeTool
member.summary: Performs an interactive resize operation in the image editor.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ResizeTool.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.ImageEditor.ResizeTool.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current scale factor of the resize operation. Changing this property is previewed immediately in the image editor. The default value of 1 preserves the original size of the image. Values below 1 downscale the image, while values above 1 upscale the image.
